title: DHS watchdog warns shutdown could imperil immigration enforcement oversight
description: The lapse in funding is forcing the department’s inspector general to suspend the majority of its audits and probes.
content: The lapse in funding is forcing the department’s inspector general to suspend the majority of its audits and probes.
